alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 4:38PM AKST until February 23 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Areas of light freezing rain and snow will continue into this evening. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Ice accumulation of less than one tenth of an inch are expected. Snow and freezing rain is expected to redevelop early Wednesday and continue into Wednesday afternoon before changing to all rain. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch are expected. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...Until 3 PM Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for reduced visibilities at times. Ice accumulations will make roads very slippery. Winds gusting to 45 mph on Wednesday. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties.
